prompts: Show me a powerful ice-type Pokemon with a majestic icy crest and a long neck.

Design a Pokemon that looks like a prehistoric creature, featuring ice-themed patterns.

Generate a gentle giant Pokemon that radiates an aura of calmness and tranquility.
Make a dazzling ice-type Pokemon that blends seamlessly with snowy landscapes.
